Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Laursen Andersen Hansen at a charity gala in Copenhagen. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Laursen Andersen Hansen is a 51 year old and comes from Denmark.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Laursen Andersen Hansen is currently divorced. His children are named Laura, Pedersen and Mathilde.
Education Background:
In 1992, Laursen graduated from Viborg Katedralskole with a secondary school diploma.
Laursen graduated from Roskilde University in 1997, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Laursen Andersen Hansen is a 51 year old Industry Leader from Denmark.
Laursen Andersen Hansen began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at Novo Nordisk A/S in 1997, laying the foundation for future success.
He then transitioned to Novo Nordisk A/S as a Biotech Startup Founder, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2003 to 2006.
At Novo Nordisk A/S, he worked as a CEO from 2006 to 2007, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
He worked as a Venture Capitalist at Bavarian Nordic A/S from 2009 to 2011, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
He has been a Industry Leader at  Zealand Pharma A/S since 2013, consistently demonstrating his ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 5790000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Greve, Roskilde and Horsens, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited a significant sum of 46270000 DKK from his father, a respected Stock Trader, in 2012, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
